questions: Most American children start school life in   _  .
How many vacations do American children have each year?
article: American schools begin in September after a long summer vacation . There are two terms  in a school year: the first term is from September to January, and the second is from February to June. Most American children go to public schools . High school students take only four or five subjects at a time. They usually go to the same classes every day, and they have homework for every class. After class they have many activities. After high school, many students go to college.
